» » » HOSTBLIZZARD CLOUD VPS SERVERS » » »

HostBlizzard is a privately owned web hosting company dedicated to providing reliable, affordable and quality shared hosting, reseller hosting and VPS hosting services to customers all over the world. Our mission has been to provide superior service, fast and friendly support and affordable web hosting solutions to individuals and businesses alike. Zap5 Networks launched the HostBlizzard brand in late 2013 to specialize in providing enterprise class web hosting, cloud servers and dedicated servers to meet the ever growing needs of both individuals and businesses alike.

All HostBlizzard services are backed by our technical support; 100% available, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year. The HostBlizzard network operations center (NOC) is staffed at all times with talented, professional engineers to assist with all of your needs. To ensure that we are able to provide you the quality of service you deserve, we have invested in powerful and high efficiency super micro servers which are housed in state-of-the-art facilities.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

HOSTBLIZZARD SOLUTIONS
Enterprise Class Hosting Solutions

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

HostBlizzard’s primary Point of Presence (POP) is out of our Piscataway, New Jersey facility. Our physical location allows us to directly connect to major backbone providers and enable our company to deliver outstanding network performance and industry leading latency.

All HostBlizzard services are backed by our technical support; 100% available, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year. The HostBlizzard network operations center (NOC) is staffed at all times with talented, professional engineers to assist with all of your needs. To ensure that we are able to provide you the quality of service you deserve, we have invested in powerful and high efficiency super micro servers which are housed in state-of-the-art facilities.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

We Guarantee Your Satisfaction!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Q: What form of payments do you accept?
A: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and PayPal.

Q: How am I billed?
A: You will be billed monthly on the anniversary of the date you registered for the server. You will only be billed for the cloud servers you deploy and the data transfer used in the previous month.

Q: What operating system do you offer?
A: Our systems allow almost any operating system to be installed. However, on hand we are capable of pre-installing your server with: CentOS, Ubuntu, Oracle Solaris, CloudLinux*, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, and Windows Server 2012.

Q: Do you have a refund policy?
A: If you are unhappy with your cloud server with HostBlizzard for any reason or just wish to close the account at anytime during the first 7 days, you will get a refund of all hosting fees paid.
